title: Eyes on Ice - Delaney Hall
location: Delaney Hall: 451 Doremus Avenue, Newark, NJ
description: Please join us if you can this week as we continue to provide support to the families and the people inside Delaney Hall who are trying to free themselves. Stand with us as we keep our Eyes on Ice.
